Name: Badge - Awakened Drive
Description: After obtaining, you can enter the Personal Space > Badge editing interface to set up the badge wall.
Description2: Battle will fully activated. Core Drive sealed within deep protocols released. The armor reconstructs itself through high-energy resonance. With all primal constraints lifted, a surge of extraordinary perception and power floods into every nerve of the wearer. In this moment, you are no longer the controller, but the will of the Core Drive itself.
